alert.note: Alert for Mississippi; New Madrid (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 3:29AM CST until January 15 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow is expected, with total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. Locally higher amounts are possible closer to the Missouri/Arkansas and Kentucky/Tennessee borders. * WHERE...Most of western Kentucky and southeast Missouri. * WHEN...From noon today to 6 PM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
